content.question: Which of the following groups would most likely gain from unanticipated inflation?

choices.label: Landlords who own apartments in cities with rent controls
Individuals who have fixed retirement incomes
Individuals who have borrowed money at fixed interest rates
Banks that have loaned all excess reserves at a fixed interest rate

content.answer: Individuals who have borrowed money at fixed interest rates
